select m_no, pd_no, num, price, o_no from cart where m_no=#{m_no}, pd_no=#{pd_no}
mapper.insert: insert into cart(m_no, pd_no, num, price, o_no) values(m_no=#{m_no}, pd_no=#{pd_no}, num=#{num}, price=#{price}, o_no=#{o_no})
